library(tidyverse)

library(ggthemes)
library(patchwork)
library(viridis)
library(dplyr)
dryadData <-read.table(file="JEcol-2020-0368.R1_data.csv", header =TRUE, sep=",")
glimpse(dryadData)
View(dryadData)

dryadCleanS<- filter(dryadData, Variable=="Recruitment subnival")

dryadCleanAl<- filter(dryadData, Variable=="Recruitment alpine")
dryadCleanSt<- filter(dryadData, Variable=="Recruitment steppe")

p1 <- ggplot(data=dryadCleanAl, mapping=aes(x=Year, fill=Value)) +
  geom_bar()
